amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide funds to the Census Bureau in order to prepare a report on the data from the service-based enumeration from the 2000 census.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding for the Census Bureau by $500,000 in order to provide for service-based enumeration data.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney (NY) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 217 (Roll no. 239).
